project_name.justification: The text states: "Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG) (OTCQB: RDGMF) (FSE: 0GC0) ('Ridgeline' or the 'Company') is pleased to announce the staking of the Atlas Gold Project, ('Atlas' or the 'Project')..."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as "Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG) (OTCQB: RDGMF) (FSE: 0GC0) ('Ridgeline' or the 'Company')".

ceo_buyer.justification: The text identifies the CEO of the acquiring company: "Chad Peters, Ridgeline's President & CEO, commented..." and later confirms "On behalf of the Board 'Chad Peters' President & CEO".

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states: "The Project is 100% owned by the Company and retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations."

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the project as: "the Atlas Gold Project, ('Atlas' or the 'Project') a high-grade, oxide gold ('Au') exploration prospect..."

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled "Ridgeline Minerals Stakes High-Grade, Carlin-Type Gold Project in Nevada" and discusses the staking of the Atlas project, which matches the project of interest.

currency.justification: The transaction is described as a 'low-cost staking' with no specific financial consideration or currency mentioned in the text.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition was made via staking claims, not a purchase from another entity. No cash payment amount is specified in the text.

share_payments_raw.justification: The acquisition was made via staking claims. No share payment is mentioned in the text.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The acquisition was made via staking claims. No combined cash and share payment is mentioned in the text.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The acquisition was made via staking claims. No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions a future "maiden drill program (3-5 holes)" but does not specify a committed meterage as part of the acquisition terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text explicitly states the project "retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations."

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text explicitly states the project "retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations."

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: "The Company acquired Atlas via the low-cost staking of 59 lode claims totaling 1,219 acres (5.0 square kilometers)."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: "The Company acquired Atlas via the low-cost staking of 59 lode claims totaling 1,219 acres (5.0 square kilometers)."

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain a mineral resource estimate. It states, "The Project has never been drilled" and only provides results from rock chip and soil samples, not a formal resource.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company is identified in the first paragraph as "Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG)".
